titleStmt.title: The actes and life of the most victorious conquerour, Robert Bruce, King of Scotland VVherein also are contained the martiall deeds of the valiant princes, Edward Bruce, Syr Iames Dowglas, Erle Thomas Randel, Walter Stewart, and sundrie others.
Bruce
titleStmt.author: Barbour, John, d. 1395.

editionStmt.edition: Newly corrected and conferred with the best and most ancient manuscripts.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
